summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 NISSAN FRONTIER. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING, THE VEHICLE SUDDENLY LOST ACCELERATION POWER.  THE CONTACT HAD THE VEHICLE TOWED TO A MECHANIC AND WAS INFORMED THAT RADIATOR COOLANT LEAKED INTO THE TRANSMISSION AND CAUSED THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 101,500. MAH
